LanguageData.Leather_WoWUnicorn.label: unicorn 皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWUnicorn.description: Tanned, dried, scraped unicorn skin. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well. But at least it looks pretty!
LanguageData.Leather_WoWForsakenhorse.label: 骸骨军马皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWForsakenhorse.description: Tanned, dried, scraped forsaken horse skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. This leather being rotted neither protects nor insulates particularly well. Smells pretty bad too.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWFairyDragon.label: 精灵龙皮
LanguageData.Leather_WoWFairyDragon.description: The tanned skin of the rare fairy dragon. Fairy dragon skin is reasonably tough, provides strong insulation against heat, and is quite beautiful.
